title: Beef fillet with chicory and blue cheese salad and celeriac chips
description: The rich, creamy walnuts complement the crisp and crunchy side salad in this delicious steak supper.Equipment: You will need a food processor.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz egg white (3 small free-range eggs whites)
1 fillet of beef on the bone
salt and freshly ground black pepper
300ml/10fl oz jus or beef gravy, to serve
